text: Ila nna mbuli ndodo kumwako, ako kunao wanhu wayagwe wogagoga mafundizo ga Balaamu, ayo yamfundize Balaki yawatendile wana wa Islaeli watende vilozo mkuwaswagiza kuja mandia galavigwe nhosa ha miwegu na kutenda ugoni.2:14 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 22â€”24; 25:1-3; 31:16; MBULI ZA WALAWI 23:4.
